column3: “This stuff is wonderful! Probably my favorite sativa. I'm prone to anxiety with strong sativas and tend to prefer hybrids, or else have to throw in a pinch of some indica to chill it out. Stella Blue is great by itself. It's a mellow, focused high that will perk you right up and make you want to do stuff. If you're not quite sure what to smoke and are worried the wrong choice will derail your plans, go with this one....”
“Very strong smelling, beefy smell, a instant head high from the beginning, tight buds that grind up fluffy and soft, very high crystal count”
“Stella blue was a love a first high it was a wonderful high for the morning time”
“Wow !!! Would love 💚💙 to get my hands on some of this 😎✌🏽️ I'd be so GRATEFUL 😊⚡️☀️”
“Gives me a happy high and smells like a fruity heaven”
“Nice sativa with happy but stoney feeling. Good berry flavor and smell”

“I picked some up last night. I used some this morning before work and damn, this shit is great. Makes me feel very happy and calm. I feel like I can function on a good level too which is nice. Bad side effect is bad cotton mouth.”

“Great sativa! Makes an akward person like myself super happy and social. Very talkative and giggly. Fun and euphoric high! Great fruity aroma and flavor. My go to flower when I'm in for a long, busy day.”

“- [ ] My body is in constant aches and pains from the abuse of BMX all my life so I was looking for a strain would provide some relief but still allow me to go ride and not effect my abilities .  Honestly, I wasn’t a fan at first but I started to really enjoy this strain as I used it more and felt the results. I especially found this strain super nice to vape at around the 190-210 temperature just before going for ri...”
“Made me awake with what I would descibe as a clear headed but heady high.  Tasted good and made me happy, some throat burn though.”
“I thought it was great the taste is amazing and you get a quick brain high although food gets a dull taste”

“i havent tried this strain yet (im looking up different blue strains to see if i can find the one im looking for) based on the description of this strain, it sounds to me kinda like it has blueberry and california orange ancestory”
